products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe purple is a soft chic purple perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this on-trend purple blind is especially great for adding a soft splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A stylish dark blue/navy shade, splash indigo blue is a stylish, contemporary colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and conservatories as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any upvc window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly under the window beading, which means no drilling.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash smokey purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The rich purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash sloe purple panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This purple dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe is an extremely attractive dusty purple colour, stylish and timeless. Perfect for injecting colour into any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). Splash sloe fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their splash indigo blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.
